summary: Jean-Louis Lebris de Kerouac , better known as Jack Kerouac, was an American author and poet.
full_text:
Gregory Nunzio Corso  was an American poet, youngest of the inner circle of Beat Generation writers .
^ William H. Honan, "Gregory Corso, a Candid-Voiced Beat Poet, Dies at 70", New York Times, January 10, 2001.
title: Gregory Corso
